Services

Knowledge is Free. Labor is Expensive.

Let us help you get on your two feet. Or four, if it's rodents.

FreeMoCap Foundation paid services policy:

  • Anything that can be infinitely and losslessly duplicated is free. Examples include code, videos, documentation, and so on.
  • Anything that cannot be infinitely and losslessly duplicated costs money. Examples include labor, cloud services, physical equipment (cameras, cables, charuco board, etc.) and so on.

Here you'll find a list of the kind of paid services FMC provides. Please fill out the services intake form and a team member will reach out!


Initial Setup

One-Time

A flat, one-time fee to ensure your capture setup is functioning properly and optimized. Can be handled remotely, or purchased at premium level to fly in a team member for in-person setup.


Dedicated Support

Monthly

A monthly fee for a set number of hours per month of dedicated support directly from our team. We'll handle things like installation, analysis, troubleshooting, and whatever else may arise. While the FreeMoCap community can offer support through channels like our Discord server, this service is direct and goes far beyond publicly available channels.


Training

One-Time (with follow-ups)

Organized training session with one month of follow-ups regarding FreeMoCap basics, remote or in-person for a premium.


Project Planning

One-Time (with follow-ups)

A series of meetings with the FMC team to assit planning for projects and research. Includes planning for equipment, space, milestones, contingency, and so on.


Analysis Pipelines

As Needed

We will build analysis pipelines to configure data into your desired format, or extract/compute particular outcomes from base output data. Cost and time depends on complexity.


Feature Request

As Needed

Got a feature you wish was included? Having issues with a particular brand of camera or software integration? Reach out and let's start a conversation!



Everyone has a reason to record human movement
We want to help them do it
